short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add useful tools to a PropertyPal page!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "View on Maps" link that will only appear in the bottom right corner of a property viewing page. The link grabs the address of the property you're viewing and opens it in a new Google Maps tab.

PropertyPal.com is a real estate website available all over Ireland.

P.S: Shoutout to the icons pack used in this extension:
Real estate icons created by Freepik - Flaticon -https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/real-estate
